Left Click.text: Tap, actual click happens after TapTime period elapses.

Left Click Drag.text: Tap to select, quickly (within TapTime period) touch selection again. Then drag.

Right Click.text: One finger down + tap second finger.

Vertical Scroll.text: Ttwo fingers side by side (e.g. index + second), move up or down holding constant distance between fingers.

Horizontal Scroll.text: Two fingers side by side (e.g. index + second), move left or right holding constant distance between fingers.

Zoom In.text: Two separated fingers side by side (e.g. thumb + index), bring together i.e. pinch.

Zoom Out.text: Two fingers side by side (e.g. thumb + index), spread.
